https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/iB6Ky3EDGC3wv5ExtAapB615tt8.jpg In "A Mighty Wind", director Christopher Guest reunites the team from "Best In Show" and "Waiting for Guffman" to tell tell the story of 60's-era folk musicians, who inspired by the death of their former manager, get back on the stage for one concert in New York City's Town Hall. A Mighty Wind
